problem_text: Some basketball players are not American. All basketball players are tall. If someone is tall, they wear large shoes. If someone wears large shoes, they wear large-sized clothes. Yuri does not wear large-size clothes.
predicates:
American(x) ::: x is American.
BasketballPlayer(x) ::: x is a basketball player.
Tall(x) ::: x is tall.
WearsLargeShoes(x) ::: x wears large shoes.
WearsLargeClothes(x) ::: x wears large-sized clothes.
Yuri ::: Yuri.

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? All tall basketball players wear large-sized clothes.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Yuri is a basketball player.
tests.conclusions: BasketballPlayer(yuri) ::: Yuri is a basketball player. FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Yuri is not tall.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Some basketball players wear large-sized clothes.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Yuri is not a basketball player.
tests.conclusions: ¬BasketballPlayer(Yuri) ::: Yuri is not a basketball player. FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? If Yuri is a basketball player, then Yuri is American.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Some American basketball players do not wear large-sized clothes.
tests.conclusions: ∃x (American(x) ∧ BasketballPlayer(x) ∧ ¬WearsLargeClothes(x)) ::: Some American basketball players do not wear large-sized clothes. FALSE

tests.questions: Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Yuri is American.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? Yuri is not American.
Based on the above information, is the following statement true or false? All tall people are basketball players.

candidate_solutions.text:
# Predicates:
American(x) ::: x is American.
BasketballPlayer(x) ::: x is a basketball player.
Tall(x) ::: x is tall.
WearsLargeShoes(x) ::: x wears large shoes.
WearsLargeClothes(x) ::: x wears large-sized clothes.
Yuri ::: Yuri.

# Premises:
∃x (BasketballPlayer(x) ∧ ¬American(x)) ::: Some basketball players are not American.
∀x (BasketballPlayer(x) → Tall(x)) ::: All basketball players are tall.
∀x (Tall(x) → WearsLargeShoes(x)) ::: If someone is tall, they wear large shoes.
∀x (WearsLargeShoes(x) → WearsLargeClothes(x)) ::: If someone wears large shoes, they wear large-sized clothes.
¬WearsLargeClothes(yuri) ::: Yuri does not wear large-size clothes.
